Questions.Question: Which is the BEST WAY to write the underlined portion of this sentence? Researchers also speculate that some teachers might have given boys more computer time because parents and teachers expected boys to need computers for future careers.
The wounded soldiers were visited by the president who honoured them with ____ for their _____.
Every June, Manila has its festival of outstanding Filipino films. This was a project initiated by
Which among the sounds below is voiceless?
“Only the heart can see rightly.” This statement is lifted from what particular novel?
Two buses leave the same station at 8:00 pm. One bus travels north at the rate of 30 kph and the other travels east at 40 kph. How many kilometers apart are the buses at 10 pm?
Calculate the mean absolute deviation of the following numbers: 60, 80, 100, 75 and 95
Which of the following is the factorization of the binomial x^2  - 4^2 ?
What value of x will satisfy the equation: 0.4(5x - 1470) = x?
The average of 5 different counting numbers is 20. What is the highest possible value that one of the numbers can have?
Despite the observed diversity among organisms, they  are all made from the same set of biomolecules composed of monomeric units except:
Which of the following examples best illustrates application of Boyle’s Law?

Answers.Text: A tire becomes harder as more air is pumped into it.
A sealed aerosol can explodes when thrown into a fire.
A balloon expands and bursts when exposed to direct sunlight.
A scuba divers stops at certain depths as he ascends to the ocean’s surface.

Questions.Question: Three liquids A, B, C were studied in a laboratory. Liquid A was found to float over B and C. It was also found that liquid A flows fastest among the three. What can be said about liquid A?
Which of the following statements represents a physical change?

Answers.Text: An antacid tablet forms bubbles when dissolved in water.
A flashlight beam slowly gets dimmer and finally dies out over time.
The lawn grows thicker every day because fertilizers were added into the soil.
Frozen mango juice melted when left standing at room temperature for 30 minutes.

Questions.Question: Acid rain occurs when _________.

Answers.Text: carbon dioxide combines with water in the atmosphere.
phosphorus-rich water in lakes evaporates to form phosphoric acid.
sulfur released in burning fossil fuels combines with water in the atmosphere.
excess hydrogen is released into the atmosphere to produce acids.

Questions.Question:
Sinabi ni Carlos P. Romulo sa isa niyang akda, “Ang Pilipino ay may dugong maharlika.” Ano ang
kahulugan nito?

Answers.Text: Ang Pilipino ay nanggaling sa malayang lahi
Ang Pilipino ay sadyang mabuti ang budhi.
Ang Pilipino ay galing sa mayamang lahi

Questions.Question: Piliin ang gawi ng pagsasalita: Kasiyahan ko nang makitang kayo’y nagmamahalan.
Laging UMUUKILKIL sa isipan ng ama ang nasirang pangako ng anak.

Kabaliwan at paglulustay ang inyong ginagawa taon-taon. Higit na marami ang maralitang nangangailangan ng salapi at dunong. Ang nagsasalita ay
He is considered as the “Father of Modern Media in Education”.
It is a term to denote a whole range of technologies associated with processing information and with sending and receiving messages.
